套.definition: to cover; to encase; cover; sheath; to overlap; to interleave; to model after; to copy; formula; harness; loop of rope; (fig.) to fish for; to obtain slyly; classifier for sets, collections; bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names); tau (Greek letter Ττ)

套交情.definition: to try to gain sb's friendship

套兒.definition: (coll.) loop of rope; noose; scheme; ploy; condom

套印.definition: color printing using several overlaid images

套取.definition: to acquire fraudulently; an illegal exchange

套口供.definition: to trap a suspect into a confession

套問.definition: to sound sb out; to find out by tactful indirect questioning

套娃.definition: Russian doll (matryoshka doll) or similar nested doll

套子.definition: sheath; case; cover; conventional method; cliché; trick; (coll.) condom

套房.definition: small room opening off another; inner room; suite; apartment; flat; (Tw) room with private bathroom

套數.definition: song cycle in Chinese opera; (fig.) a series of tricks; polite remarks; number of (things that are counted in 套[tao4], like houses)

套期保值.definition: to hedge (one's bets); to defend against risk

套牢.definition: to immobilize with a lasso; to be trapped in the stock market

套現.definition: to convert (an asset) into cash; to cash out

套用.definition: to apply (sth hitherto used in a different context); to use (rules, systems, models etc copied from elsewhere) (often implying that they aren't suited to the new situation); to borrow (a phrase); (Tw) (computing) to apply (a style, formatting etc)

套磁.definition: (coll.) to cultivate good relations with sb; to try to gain favor with sb

套紅.definition: printing portions of a page (e.g. a banner headline) in red (or other color)

套色.definition: color printing using several overlaid images

套裝.definition: outfit or suit (of clothes); set of coordinated items; kit

套話.definition: polite phrase; conventional greetings; cliché; to try to worm facts out of sb

套購.definition: a fraudulent purchase; to buy up sth illegally

套路.definition: sequence of movements in martial arts; routine; pattern; standard method

套車.definition: to harness (a horse to a cart)

套近乎.definition: to worm one's way into being friends with sb (usually derogatory)

套間.definition: vestibule; small inner room (opening to others); suite; apartment

套頭.definition: (of a garment) designed to be put on by pulling it over one's head (like a sweater or T-shirt etc)

套餐.definition: set meal; (fig.) product or service package (e.g. for a cell phone subscription)

套馬.definition: to harness a horse; to lasso a horse
